projects.title: OnlyData
projects.text: A data visualization website that delivers minimalistic visuals to people. It helps users receive quick and easy to understand information in the form of graphs and charts. OnlyData updates people on relevant and important facts, trends and numbers.

projects.title: Storyline
projects.text: A web app that displays articles corresponding to the year and topic entered by the user. You can travel back in time by browsing articles from the past generated from a list using Google News RSS feed.

projects.title: Memories App
projects.text: A CRUD web application that allows the user to store/display images and descriptions of events they want to remember. It is created using Laravel, MySQL, HTML, CSS and Javascript.

projects.title: New Player
projects.text: NewPlayer is a video manipulation program that can swap the face of a person in a video with the face of a different person in an image selected by the user. The project is written in C++ using wxWidgets for the GUI. It uses OpenCV and dlib for image processing. This project was created as an exercise to learn about wxWidgets, OpenCV and the dlib library.

projects.title: Drive Simulation
projects.text: 2D driving simulator that captures the physics of a vehicle being driven. Includes obstacles and terrain that interacts with the vehicle. Written in Python using the PyGame library.
